chat_history.message:
Hello,
My product iPhone 13 has the above problem:
My newly purchased iPhone 13, despite a condition of 'excellent', has exterior damage and a battery life of under 85%. It's hard for me to categorize it as 'excellent'.
Thank you very much for your help,

Hello ecomobile,


We would like to inform you that, in accordance with our Quality Charter, we have refunded 60€ to the customer for wrong grade


Kind regards, Ricardo-Filipe from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Can we check whether you have processed the partial refund of 60 euros on your side? Thank you.

Regards,
CH
